name: AzureFunctionapp
help: Manage function apps. To install the Azure Functions Core tools see https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-core-tools.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the function app.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: StorageAccount
properties.help: Provide a string value of a Storage Account in the provided Resource Group. Or Resource ID of a Storage Account in a different Resource Group.

properties.name: AppInsights
properties.help: Name of the existing App Insights project to be added to the Function app. Must be in the same resource group.

properties.name: AppInsightsKey
properties.help: Instrumentation key of App Insights to be added.

properties.name: ConsumptionPlanLocation
properties.help: Geographic location where Function App will be hosted. Use 'functionapp list-consumption-locations' to view available locations.

properties.name: DeploymentContainerImageName
properties.help: Linux only. Container image name from Docker Hub, e.g. publisher/image-name:tag.

properties.name: DeploymentLocalGit
properties.help: Enable local git.

properties.name: DeploymentSourceBranch
properties.help: The branch to deploy.

properties.name: DeploymentSourceUrl
properties.help: Git repository URL to link with manual integration.

properties.name: DisableAppInsights
properties.help: Disable creating application insights resource during functionapp create. No logs will be available.

properties.name: OsType
properties.help: Set the OS type for the app to be created.

properties.name: Plan
properties.help: Name or resource id of the function app service plan. Use 'appservice plan create' to get one.

properties.name: Runtime
properties.help: The functions runtime stack.

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: Space-separated tags in 'key[=value]' format. Use "" to clear existing tags.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Slot
properties.help: The name of the slot. Default to the productions slot if not specified.

properties.name: Ids
properties.help: One or more resource IDs (space-delimited). If provided, no other 'Resource Id' arguments should be specified.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the function app.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Add
properties.help: Add an object to a list of objects by specifying a path and key value pairs.  Example: --add property.listProperty <key=value, string or JSON string>.

properties.name: ForceString
properties.help: When using 'set' or 'add', preserve string literals instead of attempting to convert to JSON.

properties.name: Remove
properties.help: Remove a property or an element from a list.  Example: --remove property.list <indexToRemove> OR --remove propertyToRemove.

properties.name: Set
properties.help: Update an object by specifying a property path and value to set.  Example: --set property1.property2=<value>.

properties.name: AllowedOrigins
properties.help: Space separated origins that should be allowed to make cross-origin calls (for example: http://example.com:12345). To allow all, use "\*" and remove all other origins from the list.

properties.name: Slot
properties.help: The name of the slot. Default to the productions slot if not specified.

properties.name: Sku
properties.help: The SKU of the app service plan.

properties.name: IsLinux
properties.help: Host function app on Linux worker.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: MaxBurst
properties.help: The maximum number of elastic workers for the plan.

properties.name: MinInstances
properties.help: The number of workers for the app service plan.

properties.help: Space-separated tags in 'key[=value]' format. Use "" to clear existing tags.

properties.name: AlwaysOn
properties.help: Ensure web app gets loaded all the time, rather unloaded after been idle. Recommended when you have continuous web jobs running.

properties.name: AutoHealEnabled
properties.help: Enable or disable auto heal.

properties.name: FtpsState
properties.help: Set the Ftps state value for an app. Default value is 'AllAllowed'.

properties.name: GenericConfigurations
properties.help: Provide site configuration list in a format of either "key=value" pair or "@<json_file>".

properties.name: Http20Enabled
properties.help: Configures a web site to allow clients to connect over http2.0.

properties.name: JavaContainer
properties.help: The java container, e.g., Tomcat, Jetty.

properties.name: JavaContainerVersion
properties.help: The version of the java container, e.g., '8.0.23' for Tomcat.

properties.name: JavaVersion
properties.help: The version used to run your web app if using Java, e.g., '1.7' for Java 7, '1.8' for Java 8.

properties.name: LinuxFxVersion
properties.help: The runtime stack used for your linux-based webapp, e.g., "RUBY|2.3", "NODE|6.6", "PHP|5.6", "DOTNETCORE|1.1.0". See https://aka.ms/linux-stacks for more info.

properties.name: MinTlsVersion
properties.help: The minimum version of TLS required for SSL requests, e.g., '1.0', '1.1', '1.2'.

properties.name: NetFrameworkVersion
properties.help: The version used to run your web app if using .NET Framework, e.g., 'v4.0' for .NET 4.6 and 'v3.0' for .NET 3.5.

properties.name: PhpVersion
properties.help: The version used to run your web app if using PHP, e.g., 5.5, 5.6, 7.0.

properties.name: PrewarmedInstanceCount
properties.help: Number of pre-warmed instances a function app has.

properties.name: PythonVersion
properties.help: The version used to run your web app if using Python, e.g., 2.7, 3.4.

properties.name: RemoteDebuggingEnabled
properties.help: Enable or disable remote debugging.

properties.name: Slot
properties.help: The name of the slot. Default to the productions slot if not specified.

properties.name: StartupFile
properties.help: The startup file for linux hosted web apps, e.g. 'process.json' for Node.js web.

properties.name: Use32bitWorkerProcess
properties.help: Use 32 bits worker process or not.

properties.name: WebSocketsEnabled
properties.help: Enable or disable web sockets.

properties.help: One or more resource IDs (space-delimited). If provided, no other 'Resource Id' arguments should be specified.

properties.name: CdAppType
properties.help: Web application framework you used to develop your app. Default is AspNet.

properties.help: URL of the Visual Studio Team Services (VSTS) project to use for continuous delivery. URL should be in format https://&lt;accountname&gt;.visualstudio.com/&lt;projectname&gt;.

properties.help: Task runner for nodejs. Default is None.

properties.help: Framework used for Python application. Default is Django.

properties.name: PythonVersion
properties.help: Python version used for application. Default is Python 3.5.3 x86.

properties.name: SlotSwap
properties.help: Name of the slot to be used for deployment and later promote to production. If slot is not available, it will be created. Default: Not configured.
